clinical_study.brief_title: Biosimilarity Study of Subcutaneous Recombinant Human Erythropoietin in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Open and Monocentric Clinical Trial With Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Determination of Subcutaneous Recombinant Human Erythropoietin in Male Adults.

brief_summary.textblock: Open label and monocentriC Phase I Clinical Trial, c to Determine the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Recombinant Human Erythropoietin for Subcutaneous Use in an Adult Male Population

secondary_outcome.measure: Compare profiles for T½ between the experimental drug and the comparator.
Compare profiles for Tmax between the experimental drug and the comparator.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Erythropoietin injectable in a single subcutaneous application.

intervention.intervention_name: Experimental Erythropoietin subcutaneous injection single dose of 4,000 IU
intervention.description: Recombinant Human Erythropoietin: single dose of 4,000 IU (syringe filled with 0.4 mL with 4,000 IU) of the experimental drug should be administered subcutaneously
intervention.arm_group_label: Erythropoietin injectable in a single subcutaneous application.

intervention.intervention_name: Active comparator Erythropoietin Eprex® subcutaneous injection single dose of 4,000 IU
intervention.description: Recombinant Human Erythropoietin: single dose of 4,000 IU (syringe filled with 0.4 mL with 4,000 IU) of Eprex® should be administered subcutaneously
intervention.arm_group_label: Erythropoietin injectable in a single subcutaneous application.

overall_official.affiliation: Unidade Integrada de Farmacologia e Gastroenterologia
